Class MyFarm

java.lang.Object
main.MyFarm
public class MyFarm extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MyFarm()
    Constructs a farm by creating a farmlot, arraylist of seeds and tools, setting the day to 1 and a farmer.

    • addSeeds

      public void addSeeds(Seed seed)
      Defines and adds a seed to the seed array list
      Parameters:
      name - name of the seed
      type - type of seed
      harvestTime - time needed for the seed to be ready for harvest
      waterNeed - amount of water needed for the seed to be ready for harvest
      fertilizerNeed - amount of fertilizer needed for the seed to be ready for harvest
      cost - cost for each seed
      basePrice - base price for selling harvested crop
      xp - experience yielded after harvesting

    • addTools

      public void addTools(Tool tool)
      Defines and adds a tool to the tool array list
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the tool
      cost - Cost of the tool
      xp - Experience yielded for each use of the tool

      public ArrayList<FarmLot> getAdjacent(FarmLot[][] farmLot, int row, int col)
      Creates and returns an arraylist of farmlots that are adjacent to a specified farmlot Reference: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/find-all-adjacent-elements-of-given-element-in-a-2d-array-or-matrix/
      Parameters:
      farmLot - the array of farmlots
      row - the row index of the specified farm lot
      col - the column index of the specified farm lot
      Returns:
      the arraylist of occupied farm lots
